subject: Re: ..weeding out bad debs off mirrors, was: Can I get some help, please?
body:
thanks:-)JohnOn 5/25/07, Rafal Wozniak <debian@rafal.wozniak.name> wrote:
On Friday 25 May 2007 22:38:08 Jonathan (ac3bf1) wrote:run "zcat indices/md5sums.gz | md5sum -c" at root directory with debian mirror> any automation we can use to check the files though md5?
> like a script maybe? anyone done something similar?--To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.orgwith a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact
